excerpt: Winter resort with neoclassical buildings lining a river, plus a gondola leading up to the ski area.
detail_description: Nestled in the stunning Caucasus Mountains, Gornyy Kurort Roza Khutor is a winter wonderland that captivates visitors with its neoclassical architecture and picturesque riverside setting. This modern ski resort boasts an impressive gondola system that whisks you up to exhilarating slopes, perfect for skiing and snowboarding enthusiasts. Beyond the thrilling outdoor activities, including cross-country skiing at the Laura Center and biathlon experiences, there are also charming dining options ranging from Italian to Asian cuisine.
name: Gornyy Kurort Roza Khutor
address: Ulitsa Olimpiyskikh Rekordov, 37, 1, с, Estosadok, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354392

excerpt: Athletic park & home of the 2014 Winter Olympics, hosting high-profile sports events & musical acts.
detail_description: Olimpiyskiy Park Adler is a sports venue that hosted the 2014 Winter Olympics and continues to host high-profile sports events and musical performances. It offers an impressive atmosphere with vast terranes surrounded by abundant greenery. The staff is friendly and the park is well-organized, ensuring a pleasant experience for visitors. While it may not be ideal for lunch, it provides ample entertainment at a reasonable price. Patience may be required due to the large number of people.
name: Olimpiyskiy Park Adler
address: Adler, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354340

excerpt: Entertainment, sports & car racing venue at the site of the 2014 Winter Olympics.
detail_description: Олимпийский Парк, located in Sochi, is a sprawling entertainment and sports complex that was the site of the 2014 Winter Olympics. It's a vibrant destination offering a wide range of activities for visitors of all ages. From renting scooters and bicycles to exploring various attractions, there's something for everyone. The park also hosts exhibitions and events throughout the year, creating a dynamic atmosphere.
name: Олимпийский Парк
address: ул. Просвещения, Bolshoy Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354340

detail_description: Sochi's arboretum is a lush garden with over 1500 species of trees and shrubs, including various palm species. The cable car to the arboretum offers stunning views and an impressive feat of architecture and engineering. While some visitors find the experience ambivalent, others appreciate the ease of getting tickets and helpful customer service. The ride provides a scenic journey to the top of the park, where additional fees apply for walking back down.
name: Cable car to Arboretum
address: Prospekt Pushkina, 8, Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354002

excerpt: Amusement park with rides for adults & kids, a dolphinarium, a fairground, sports facilities & cafe.
detail_description: Bol'shoy Sochinskiy Del'finariy is a popular public park in Sochi, offering a variety of attractions for both adults and children. The park features rides, a dolphinarium, fairground games, sports facilities, and a cafe. Visitors can enjoy dolphin shows with ticket prices ranging from 200 to 800 rubles for adults and affordable options for children.
name: Bol'shoy Sochinskiy Del'finariy
address: Ulitsa Yegorova, 1, Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354000

detail_description: The Akhun tower offers a breathtaking panorama of the surroundings. Constructed in the 1930s by incarcerated individuals for tourist purposes, it may not be entirely authentic but is certainly worth a visit while in Sochi. Admission is a mere 100 rubles, which is quite affordable. Additionally, there are charming shops and cafes where one can find delightful tea and other reasonably priced items. Following this, descending to the Agura waterfalls provides an incredible hiking experience.
name: Akhun tower
address: Khostinskiy, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354039

excerpt: Modern aquarium featuring a tunnel tank with sharks & colorful fish, a mermaid show & touch pools.
detail_description: Sochi Discovery World Aquarium is a modern aquarium that offers a unique experience with its tunnel tank featuring sharks and colorful fish, as well as mermaid shows and touch pools. While some sources position it as the best and largest in Russia, it is actually smaller than the Moscow aquarium. However, with over 200 species of fish including sharks, piranhas, moray eels, and seahorses, it's still worth a visit.
name: Sochi Discovery World Aquarium
address: Lenina St, 219 А/4, Adler, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354364

excerpt: Family-friendly ski resort with runs for all abilities & mountain-view gondolas, plus night skiing.
detail_description: Gazprom is a family-friendly ski resort located in Krasnaya Polyana, offering a variety of runs suitable for all skill levels and scenic gondola rides with mountain views. The Rosa Valley, where the resort is situated, features well-equipped river embankments lined with vibrant buildings housing shops, restaurants, hotels, and entertainment options such as a casino, ice rink, go-karts, and playgrounds.
name: Gazprom
address: Achipsinskaya Ulitsa, 16, п, 16, п, Estosadok, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354392

excerpt: Picturesque park featuring various trees & plants, plus walking paths, benches & a pond with swans.
name: Парк «Южные культуры»
address: Ulitsa Gubernskaya, 13, Adler, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354340

excerpt: Open-air stadium with 40,000 capacity, now used for training & matches for national soccer team.
name: Stadion Fisht
address: Olympic Ave, 15, Bolshoy Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354340

excerpt: Lush, ancient 741-acre boxwood forest on a river abundant in tree & shrub species & birdlife.
detail_description: The Tiso-Samshitovaya Roshcha park is a lush and ancient 741-acre forest situated alongside a river. It boasts a rich variety of trees, shrubs, and bird species.
name: Tiso-Samshitovaya Roshcha
address: Ulitsa Samshitovaya, Khosta Microdistrict, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354037

excerpt: Striking sports hall resembling an iceberg & hosting ice skating & curling events, plus concerts.
detail_description: The Iceberg Skating Palace is a remarkable sports venue in Sochi, resembling an iceberg with its striking architecture. It hosts a variety of events including ice skating, curling, concerts, and shows featuring world-famous performers like Evgenia Medvedova. Visitors have described the facility as beautiful and stunning, praising its unique design and top-notch performances. The venue has also been recommended for hosting amazing experiences during events like the world youth festival.
name: Ледовый дворец спорта Айсберг
address: Олимпийский парк, Triumfalnaya St, Adler, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354354

excerpt: Popular beach providing a promenade, swimming pool, sand volleyball courts & picnic areas.
detail_description: Imeretinskiy Beach is a well-liked coastal destination featuring a boardwalk, a pool for swimming, courts for sand volleyball, and designated areas for picnicking. The beach offers pleasant water conditions and boasts mesmerizing sunsets. It is known as a favorable spot for swimming and is generally regarded as an enjoyable location to visit. However, the accommodations and services provided may not meet expectations.
name: Imeretinskiy Beach
address: Bolshoy Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia

detail_description: Bolshoy Ice Dome in Sochi is a modern ice arena that hosts KHL games in a comfortable setting with reasonably priced snacks. Visitors have had positive experiences, praising the polite staff and enjoyable hockey games. The venue also offers new scooters and bicycles for rent at Prokat 123. It has been described as a beautiful and monumental place, providing unique experiences during events like the World Youth Festival 2024.
name: Bolshoy Ice Dome
address: Olympic Ave, 7, Adler, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354340

excerpt: Series of picturesque waterfalls along the Agura river that tumble into a rocky pool.
name: Agurskiye Vodopady
address: Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354024

excerpt: Olympic sports center with training grounds & stadium close to downhill & cross-country ski trails.
detail_description: The Laura Cross-country Ski & Biathlon Center is an Olympic sports center with training grounds and a stadium, conveniently located near downhill and cross-country ski trails. Visitors can enjoy a variety of activities in both winter and summer, such as skiing, Husky Park, Reindeer Farm, Green Park, hiking, and exploring the picturesque mountains. The center offers comfortable cabins and delicious restaurants; however, some visitors find the prices to be on the higher side.
name: Laura Cross-country Ski & Biathlon Center
address: ул. Олимпийских рекордов, 16, Estosadok, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354392

excerpt: Plant-filled park with a penguin enclosure & dolphin shows, plus rides including a Ferris wheel.
detail_description: Park Kul'tury I Otdykha is an amusement park that boasts a wide array of attractions, including a penguin enclosure and dolphin shows. In addition, visitors can enjoy various rides, such as a Ferris wheel. However, it lacks ample green spaces and relaxation zones. Despite this drawback, the park provides great entertainment and serves as a pleasant hangout spot. It offers numerous enjoyable activities for individuals seeking fun and excitement in a vibrant environment.
name: Park Kul'tury I Otdykha
address: Bolshoy Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354200

excerpt: Aquarium with dolphin, beluga whale & seal performances, plus swimming with dolphins & a cafe.
name: Adlerskiy Del'finariy
address: Lenina St, 219 к.2, Adler, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354364

excerpt: Complex offering baccarat, poker, blackjack & roulette, plus restaurants & live entertainment.
detail_description: Kazino Sochi is a sophisticated establishment that offers a variety of gambling options, including baccarat, poker, blackjack, and roulette. Alongside the exciting games, visitors can enjoy fine dining experiences and live entertainment. The casino staff are attentive and accommodating, making the registration process quick and easy. It is an expansive venue with stunning aesthetics that provide a pleasant atmosphere for leisure activities. English-speaking personnel are available to assist guests in their preferred language.
name: Kazino Sochi
address: Estonskaya Ulitsa, 51, Estosadok, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354392

detail_description: The Koleso Obozreniya - Samoye Bol'shoye V Rossii I Luchshiye Razvlecheniya Sochi amusement park ride is extremely impressive and enjoyable. With its remarkable features and attractions, it offers a delightful experience for visitors. It is known as one of the largest and most outstanding amusement park rides in Russia, providing top-tier entertainment.
name: Koleso Obozreniya - Samoye Bol'shoye V Rossii I Luchshiye Razvlecheniya Sochi
address: Bolshoy Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354200

excerpt: Series of bronze sculptures depicting characters from a renowned 1960s comedy film.
name: Monument to the heroes of the movie "The Diamond Arm"
address: Ulitsa Moskvina, 2А, Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354009

name: Muzey Arkheologii Na Roza Khutor
address: площадь Роза, 1 Адлерский район, село Эстосадок, Роза Хутор, Сочи, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354392

detail_description: Roza Pik, a stunning location with breathtaking views, requires clear weather for optimal enjoyment. For an enhanced experience, consider hiking along the Stone Peak, positioned at an impressive altitude of 2500 meters. A short walk to the nearest open lift may be necessary. It is advisable to bring warm clothing and sturdy footwear due to the gravel path throughout. Despite these considerations, visiting Roza Pik proves highly captivating.
name: Roza Pik
address: Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354342

detail_description: Mendeliha Park Falls offers a stunning landscape, although the trail can be quite lengthy. While not particularly challenging, it is recommended to travel light for better enjoyment. The park is well-organized but tends to get crowded. If in the vicinity of Roza Khutor, this destination is worth considering. Don't miss the opportunity to take the full circle trip around all the waterfalls and make sure to visit the breathtaking observation deck at Golden Waterfall.
name: Park Falls "Mendeliha"
address: Адлерский Россия, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354342

excerpt: Water park with swimming pools, slides & a lazy river, plus a roller coaster, kids' area & eateries.
detail_description: Аквапарк "Морская Звезда" offers an array of attractions for visitors to enjoy. With its collection of swimming pools, slides, and a lazy river, it provides ample opportunities for water-based fun and relaxation. Additionally, the park boasts a thrilling roller coaster that is sure to delight adrenaline seekers. Families with young children will appreciate the dedicated kids' area designed with their entertainment in mind.
name: Аквапарк «Морская Звезда»
address: Ulitsa Pobedy, 153м, Bolshoy Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354200

detail_description: "My Russia" is an open-air Ethnographic Museum that showcases the architectural traditions and customs of various Russian regions. The museum features pavilions representing different architectural styles from places like the Caucasus, Suzdal, Moscow, Kazan, and Siberia. Visitors can explore exhibitions and purchase souvenirs while learning about Russia's multicultural heritage. The friendly staff offers workshops and insights into regional peculiarities, providing a hands-on experience for both kids and adults.
name: My Russia
address: улица Набережная Лаванды, 9, Estosadok, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354392

detail_description: I have attended several exceptional shows at the Zimniy Teatr, and each one has been a delightful experience. The venue itself is stunning, and all of the performances have been impressive. This theater is a captivating destination that offers a plethora of events throughout the summer season.
name: Zimniy Teatr
address: Teatral'naya Ulitsa, 2, Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354036

detail_description: Adler Lighthouse is situated on CHAYKA1 beach and can be reached by public transport. While it may not be a must-see attraction, it's a nice spot for a photo opportunity. The city beach, though not the cleanest, is easily accessible with gray pebbles and some sand. It offers amenities like showers, changing rooms, and paid sun loungers. Visitors are advised to take their belongings when leaving for snacks as cleaners remove unattended items during sudden rain.
name: Adler lighthouse
address: Unnamed Road, Adler, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354340

excerpt: Summer health resort & winter sports center with downhill & cross-country ski runs, plus spa hotels.
detail_description: Gazprom ski resort is a fantastic destination that offers both summer health retreats and winter sports activities. Situated in an ideal location, this smartly designed resort provides a lively atmosphere without the overwhelming tourist crowds found at larger resorts like Rosa. With excellent downhill and cross-country ski runs, as well as exciting freeride options, Gazprom offers great tracks for all skill levels. Additionally, the resort boasts spa hotels where visitors can relax and enjoy the amazing surroundings.
name: Gazprom
address: Олимпийская ул., 24, Estosadok, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354392

excerpt: Large national park and home to reintroduced Persian leopards, plus waterfalls & hiking trails.
detail_description: Sochi National Park, also known as the Western Caucasus UNESCO Reserve, is a vast protected area that is home to a variety of wildlife, including reintroduced Persian leopards. The park boasts diverse flora and fauna, with hiking trails, waterfalls, and scenic viewpoints for nature enthusiasts to explore. Visitors can enjoy picnicking and immerse themselves in the picturesque landscape. The park's lush vegetation and relict forests make it an ideal destination for those seeking outdoor adventures.
name: Sochi National Park
address: Kurortnyy Prospekt, 74, Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354002

excerpt: Museum with 4,000+ objects & displays exploring the history of Sochi from ancient to modern times.
detail_description: The local history museum in Sochi, known as Muzey Istorii Goroda-Kurorta Sochi, boasts a collection of over 4,000 objects and displays that delve into the region's rich past from ancient eras to modern times. Situated within a small space, it offers visitors the opportunity to explore the fascinating story of Sochi and its surrounding area. The museum is complemented by a charming park, enhancing the overall experience with elements showcasing nature and marine life.
name: Muzey Istorii Goroda-Kurorta Sochi
address: Ulitsa Vorovskogo, 54/11, Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354000

excerpt: Walks past walnut groves & rhododendron blooms to a dramatic waterfall dropping into a natural pool.
detail_description: The park Orekhovskiy Vodopad offers a scenic experience with its lush walnut groves and blooming rhododendrons, leading visitors to a stunning waterfall that cascades into a natural pool. Accessible by public transport bus 102, which operates hourly from the city center, this park is highly recommended for its picturesque waterfalls. Upon arrival, visitors can find convenience in the small shop located at the bus stop.
name: Orekhovskiy Vodopad
address: Nizhneye Orekhovo, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354055

detail_description: Mamedovo Ushchel'ye is a picturesque natural spot that offers a 950-meter route with equipped paths, signs, and trash cans. The entry fee is 200 rubles per person. The uphill road features benches for resting and leads to four stunning waterfalls and a rocky canyon. It's an ideal place for those who enjoy walking through beautiful natural settings. Visitors can return from the canyon along the riverbed if they have suitable footwear.
name: Mamedovo Ushchel'ye
address: Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354200

excerpt: Science museum featuring interactive exhibits & electrical experiments with audience participation.
detail_description: The Mechanical Museum of Leonardo da Vinci is an engaging science museum that offers interactive exhibits and electrical experiments with audience participation. It showcases mechanisms and machines recreated from the drawings and diagrams left by Leonardo, including perpetual motion machines, flying machines, catapults, crossbows, trebuchets, and auxiliary mechanisms. Visitors can touch and activate some of these exhibits while guides explain their purpose and principles of work.
name: Mechanical Museum of Leonardo da Vinci
address: Ulitsa Mezhdunarodnaya, 12, Bolshoy Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354037

excerpt: Turquoise & white Orthodox church with mosaics, a gilded altarpiece & frescoes of the saints.
detail_description: The Khram Zhivonachal'noy Troitsy is a stunning Orthodox church with an exquisite design. It features beautiful mosaics, a gilded altarpiece, and frescoes depicting various saints. The color scheme of turquoise and white creates a visually appealing contrast. The church stands tall above a column embellished with luxurious gilding, while wooden elements under the roof resemble an old ship's structure in Cherry Brown.
name: Khram Zhivonachal'noy Troitsy
address: Bolshoy Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354340

detail_description: The entrance fee to Zmeykovskiye Waterfalls park is 200 rubles. While the food may be a bit pricey, it's delicious. Visitors can enjoy the fresh air, the soothing sound of water, and experience moments of peaceful silence within the park.
name: Zmeykovskiye Waterfalls
address: Izmaylovskaya Ulitsa, 180, Izmailovka, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354064

excerpt: Museum in a grand neoclassical building featuring Russian painting & sculpture from many eras.
detail_description: Sochinskiy Khudozhestvennyy Muzey is an art museum housed in a magnificent neoclassical structure, showcasing a diverse collection of Russian paintings and sculptures spanning various periods. The G8 language school organized an English tour at the museum, highlighting the impressive artworks brought to Sochi by German artists. This captivating event was not only a feast for the eyes but also provided an opportunity to engage with friendly individuals.
name: Sochinskiy Khudozhestvennyy Muzey
address: Kurortnyy Prospekt, 51, Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354000

detail_description: The suspension bridge spanning the Dagomys River offers breathtaking views of the surrounding area, including Mount Uspenka. The bridge is in impeccable condition, sturdy and spacious. Although it may sway slightly when pedestrians exert force on it, cars are not permitted to cross.
name: Suspension bridge across the river Dagomys
address: р., Bolshoy Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354207

detail_description: The observation deck offers captivating vistas and houses a delightful small store offering refreshments. While it may not warrant a special journey, it is certainly worth visiting if one happens to be passing by. It serves as a pleasant rest stop during a drive, showcasing stunning scenery of the river Mzymta valley.
name: Observation deck overlooking the valley of the river Mzymta
address: A148, 172, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354386

excerpt: Relaxed, contemporary complex of shops & services, with a food court & indoor water park.
detail_description: Gorki Moll is a modern and trendy shopping complex that offers a wide range of shops and amenities. It features a diverse selection of stores, services, and dining options including a food court. Visitors can enjoy browsing through the various shops that offer an array of clothing items, particularly sportswear. Additionally, the mall is bustling with activity as it houses cafes, restaurants, and bars for individuals to relax and unwind after their shopping endeavors.
name: Gorki Moll
address: Ul. Gornaya Karusel', 3, Estosadok, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354392

excerpt: Joseph Stalin's onetime holiday villa with historical memorabilia & guided tours in Russian.
detail_description: Dacha Stalina, also known as Zelenaya Roscha, is a historical villa located in Sochi that once served as Joseph Stalin's vacation home. The city of Sochi underwent significant reconstruction in the 1930s under Stalin's direction, and his favored architect Miron Merzhanov designed this leafy summer residence for him. Today, visitors can explore the well-maintained green house and its authentic furniture on guided tours conducted in Russian.
name: Dacha Stalina
address: Санаторий Зеленая роща, Kurortnyy Prospekt, 120/1, Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354024

excerpt: A trail through beech forests & sub-alpine meadows leads to this waterfall on the Aibga Ridge.
detail_description: The Waterfall Polikarya is a popular tourist attraction that can be reached through a scenic trail, passing through beech forests and sub-alpine meadows on the Aibga Ridge. This magnificent waterfall offers breathtaking views to those who are willing to embark on a long walk. Additionally, there are convenient transportation options available such as two cable car roads and two chair lifts, making it easily accessible.
name: Waterfall Polikarya
address: Estosadok, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354392

excerpt: Guided tours of a cave complex thought to have healing air, with colored lights & stalactites.
detail_description: Vorontsovskaya Peshchera, a renowned cave complex, offers guided excursions characterized by the presence of therapeutic atmosphere and adorned with illuminated hues and hanging mineral formations. This natural wonder provides visitors with an opportunity to explore its intricate passageways while benefiting from its reputed restorative air, enhanced by vivid lighting effects and impressive stalactitic formations that dangle from above.
name: Vorontsovskaya Peshchera
address: Krasnodarskiy kray, Russia, 354391

detail_description: Located within the expansive Riviera Park, this charming and adequately sized establishment is known as the Ocean's hidden gem. Providing a refreshing atmosphere through its efficient air conditioning, visitors are treated to an array of exquisite aquatic lifeforms dwelling in captivating and scarce waters. The tour itself follows a circular route, allowing guests to marvel at various species of fish and animals for approximately seven to eight minutes. Curiosity arises as one wonders why the sharks refrain from consuming their smaller counterparts in this enchanting environment.
name: secrets of the Ocean
address: Ulitsa Yegorova, 1, Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354000

detail_description: The plantation sites where Matsestinsky tea is produced are incredibly picturesque and have a delightful aroma. However, some visitors have reported encountering impolite behavior from certain female tour guides. Despite this, the café at the plantation is highly regarded and staffed by well-mannered and educated young women. The prices for tea range from 65 rubles upwards, with the option to purchase larger quantities at a reduced cost per unit.
name: Matsestinsky tea
address: Izmaylovskaya Ulitsa, 141, Bolshoy Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354078

excerpt: Limestone rocks associated with the Greek myth of Prometheus, with a statue & a small nearby cafe.
name: Orlinyye Skaly
address: Мацестинская ул., Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354024

detail_description: The Volkonsky dolmen is an awe-inspiring place of energy and significance that should not be missed. Each part of the gorge offers a visually pleasing experience, especially during autumn when the vibrant colors are delightful. This dolmen holds immense historical importance as it is the only one in the world that remains intact and monolithic throughout time. While there is an entrance fee of 200 rubles, it would be ideal for visitors to come in comfortable attire.
name: Volkonsky dolmen
address: Volkonka, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354212

excerpt: Eclectic collection of toys, utensils, drink bottles & poster art from the days of the USSR.
detail_description: The Mega Muzey Sssr is a diverse collection of artifacts from the days of the USSR, including an assortment of toys, utensils, drink bottles, and poster art. This unique museum allows visitors to fully engage with its exhibits, encouraging them to touch and hold items like weapons. The variety of displays is truly impressive, even featuring working slot machines such as the Sea Battle game for 15 kopecks. The museum also offers two separate halls dedicated to cinema and disco.
name: Mega Muzey Sssr
address: Navaginskaya Ulitsa, 7/3, Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354000

detail_description: Coral Beach is a popular spot in Resort Town, offering amenities such as a cafe, free clean toilets, umbrellas, and sun loungers. Visitors can also find hand washing taps and showers on the beach. The beach closes at 20:00 but there's an alternative nearby called Izvestia beach which remains open.
name: Coral beach
address: Ulitsa Prosveshcheniya, 83к1, Adler, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354340

excerpt: Research institute museum & gardens with ornamental & subtropical plants & international trees.
detail_description: Derevo Druzhby is a research institute museum and gardens that showcase a wide variety of ornamental and subtropical plants, as well as international trees. Despite its small size, the museum holds significant historical value that many people are not aware of. It is definitely worth visiting to appreciate the photos displaying branches skillfully grafted onto trees. The park surrounding this amazing tree and historical man is simply breathtaking. Its beauty leaves visitors in awe.
name: Derevo Druzhby
address: Yana Fabriciusa St, 2/5, лит. А, Sochi, Krasnodar Krai, Russia, 354002
